Innate Power: Select A, G, or R. Until the end of your next turn, you may activate that icon's effects. Either draw a card or play a card.
Incapacitated: One Player may Draw 1 card now.
One Player may Play 1 card now.
The Environment Target with the highest HP deals each Non-Hero Target 2 Melee damage.
Name: Naturalist

Bestial Shift.text:
G: The naturalist regains 3 HP. You may use a Power now.
	R: Reduce Damage dealt to the Naturalist by 1 until the start of your next turn.
	A: The naturalist deals 1 Target 3 Toxic Damage. You may use a Power now.

Crafty Assault.text:
The Naturalist deals up to 3 Targets 2 Melee Damage each.
	G: You may destroy up to 2 Ongoing cards.

Feral Fury.text:
The Naturalist deals 1 Target 2 Melee Damage.
	A: The Naturalist deals 1 Target 2 Toxic Damage.

Hyperactive Senses.text:
Reveal the top 2 cards of any 2 decks. Put them back on top of their decks in any order.
	G: You may discard the top card of any 2 decks.

Primal Charge.text:
G: Draw 4 cards.
	R: The Naturalist deals 1 Target 2 Melee Damage.
	A: The Naturalist deals 1 Target 3 Melee Damage.

Shifter's Strength.text: Discard any number of cards. Draw as many cards as you discarded this way. You may play a card.

The Predator's Eye.text:
Increase Damage dealt to 1 Target by 1 until the start of your turn.
	A:  You may draw up to 2 cards. The Naturalist deals 1 Target X Melee Damage, where X = 3 minus the number of cards drawn this way.

Threatening Stomp.text:
The Naturalist deal 1 Target 4 Melee Damage.
	R: Damage dealt by a Target Damaged this way is redirected to The Naturalist until the start of your turn.

Cornered Beast.power:
Destroy a Target with 3 or fewer HP.
	A: If there are more non-Hero Targets than Hero Targets, increase Damage dealt by The Naturalist by 1.

Environmental Allies.text:
Reduce Damage dealt to Environment Targets by 1.
	G: Hero Targets are Immune to Damage dealt by Environment Targets.

Indomitable Force.start of turn: At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
Indomitable Force.text:
Reduce Damage dealt to The Naturalist by 1.
	R: Whenever Damage would be dealt to a Hero Target, redirect it to The Naturalist.

Natural Forms Power.power:
G: One Player draws 2 cards.
	R: The Naturalist regains 2 HP.
	A: The Naturalist deals up to 2 Targets 1 Toxic Damage each.

Resilient Hide.start of turn: R: At the start of your turn, The Naturalist regains 1 HP.
Resilient Hide.text: Whenever exactly 1 Damage would be dealt to The Naturalist, prevent that Damage.

modifiers.text: Whenever taking exactly 1 damage, prevent it.

The Deadly Crocodile.text: Increase Damage dealt by The Naturalist by 1.
The Deadly Crocodile.on entry: When this card enters play, destroy any other Form cards.
The Deadly Crocodile.power:
The Naturalist deals 1 Target 2 Melee Damage.
	You may activate 'A' effects.

The Formidable Rhinoceros.text: Reduce Damage dealt to The Naturalist by 1.
The Formidable Rhinoceros.on entry: When this card enters play, destroy any other Form cards.
The Formidable Rhinoceros.power:
Draw 2 cards.
	You may activate 'R' effects.

The Nimble Gazelle.on entry: When this card enters play, destroy any other Form cards.
The Nimble Gazelle.power:
The Naturalist regains 3 HP.
	You may activate 'G' effects.

Blend Into the Pack.text: The first time The Naturalist would take damage each turn, reduce that Damage by the number of Environment Targets in play.

modifiers.text: reduce first damage taken each turn by number of environment targets

Natural Born Vigor.start of turn: At the start of your turn, The Naturalist may regain 4 HP. If he does, destroy this card.
Natural Born Vigor.text: You may use an additional Power on your turn.
